name: Cannon Shots
description:
A fun game where you have to shoot a cannonball 💣 and try to knock down the walls.

There are several types of walls such as wood, rock, buildings, you have to destroy the chests 👑 once destroyed or the chests are destroyed you will go to the next level and add money 💰 which will help you to buy better cannonballs in the store.

The game has E 5 STAGES divided into 10 levels each stage, if you do not manage to reach the last level of the stage it will start again from the initial level of the stage.

Remember that each level has 5 bullets available once they are exhausted, you will lose the game as long as you do not destroy the chests, an important fact is to remind you that the walls have different life hardnesses as well as the bullets that you buy in-game.
